phases.label: Planned
phases.description: Repository or component is planned but development has not started. May have placeholder README only.

phases.label: Prototype
phases.description: Proof of concept or experimental implementation. Not intended for any use beyond exploration. May be discarded entirely.

phases.label: Alpha
phases.description: Active development with core functionality taking shape. APIs and schemas may change without notice. Not recommended for production. Early feedback welcome.

phases.label: Beta
phases.description: Feature complete and stabilizing. APIs may still change but with deprecation notices. Suitable for non-critical use. Community contributions welcome.

phases.label: Stable
phases.description: Production ready. APIs follow semantic versioning. Breaking changes only in major versions with migration guides.

phases.label: Maintenance
phases.description: No new features planned. Bug fixes and security patches only. Consider migration to successor if available.

phases.label: Deprecated
phases.description: Being phased out. No new PRs accepted. Users should migrate to recommended alternative.

phases.label: Archived
phases.description: No longer maintained. Repository is read-only for historical reference. No support provided.
